fko.chessly.ui.SwingGUI

Class SwingGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • fko.chessly.ui.SwingGUI.SwingGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelObserver, UserInterface, java.util.Observer
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public final class SwingGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface
    Graphical User Interface for the Chessly game. This UI will not be maintained any longer. Any new features will end up in the JavaFX UI.
    Author:
    Frank Kopp (frank@familie-kopp.de)
